text: dēva granthaya denu læbūvan gen, "num̆balā ehi adahas janayāṭa pæhædili karanu, tavada num̆balā eya vasan nokaranu" yæyi allāh pratignā gat avasthāva sihipat karanu. namut ovuhu eya ovun gē piṭa pedesin piṭupasaṭa visi kaḷōya. ē (pratignāva) venuvaṭa alpa milak labā gattōya. ovun milaṭa gannā dǣ itā napuru viya
